name: Josephine and Friends
storyline:
Josephine is a very happy girl. She likes to cook, play with her friends and help others. Josephine has a horse which she likes to ride. She loves to dress in funny clothes and has a cupboard full of clothes. Josephine is very good at singing. She sings in a band along with her friends.

Sofus is Josephine’s best friend. He often comes up with ideas of what they shall do. He loves food and comes running when it smells carrotcake. Sofus likes to do skateboarding, always wears a cap and is a bit mischievious. In the winter he use to snowboarding.

Peter Porcubine is a nice hedgehog who is very intelligent. He helps his friends with mathematics, the english language and when they need to learn a new letter. He likes bugs and use to visit the forest with his magnifying glass to discover new species.

Melanie Mouse is always helpful and loves to do things. She is a bit frighten, but use to join her friends on adventures. But she does not dare to enter the haunted house, because it is spooky. She is very good at knitting and plays synthesizer and trumpet in the band.

Fred Frog is very good at building things. Since he is a frog he is very good at jumping. He is always in a good mood and is always smiling.

Mike Fox is a nice guy who likes to help his friends. He always wears his cap back and front and is good at shooting slingshot. He can shoot at berries and balloon, if he needs to. He is a bit older than the others and takes good care om Melanie Mouse. Mike Fox loves to go skiing and is very good at it.
summary:
Josephine and Friends is an educational game for children. You play as Josephine through summer and winter. In the summer you go on a fishing trip, play piano and solve assignments in the plot of vegetables. In the winter you can go snowboarding with Sofus, attend a concert or look for Melanie Mouse in her huge food cellar.

This game contains many activities and a lot of songs. You can print out activities to do after the computer has been shut down, such as colour pictures, sing songs and cook.
